EmailTemplate.subject: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, donâ€™t forget to register!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You're invited to our San Francisco Open House and Happy Hour on Monday, March 21 from 4:00 to 7:00pm PT.
Connect with Bigcommerce product and engineering experts and network with your colleagues, while enjoying food and beverages.
Come by and say hello!
Bigcommerce Open House & Happy Hour <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/SF-Open-House-Registration.html]]> When: March 21, 2016 from 4:00 - 7:00pm PT Where: 685 Market Street, 3rd Floor San Francisco, CA 94105 Hosts: Bigcommerce product and engineering teams
Save your spot now <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/SF-Open-House-Registration.html]]>
Want to Invite a friend? Simply forward this email to a friend and encourage them to register.
Kind regards, The Bigcommerce Partner Team
